page.title: 19ACTIVITIES, BONAR BRIDGE
page.content: The young people in Bonar Bridge can join{Cubs, Brownies, Guides}and the {Youth Club.}The sports they can take part in locally include{golf, {football and badminton. {The Friendship Club}is a group of pensioners who are entertained by people who play an instrument or sing. The meetings are held in the Church Hall.The season ends at summer but continues in the winter. {The British Legion}is a club with a roll of about 100 members. They do various things like supporting charities and organising the Armistice Day Parade. During the winter there were { classes}in pottery, upholstery and car maintenance held in the school.
